Html:
Hey, just wanted to let you know that I've been busy lately, but still plan to further improve Healadin and help rawr any other way I can.  I lost my job a couple weeks ago, and had my MS studio set up on my work laptop.  I've been so busy with looking for another job that I have not had time to set up everything on my home computer.  Right now I am in full time "study for my next interview" mode, as I expect to get hammered with programming questions and need to study up on data structures, algorithms, and syntax of languages I have not used in a while.  It's like college all over again!

Anyway, like I said, when things calm down, I will get back to Healadin.
